law.catch_line: Subject to the hearing provisions of § 11-415 of this subtitle, the Commissioner may suspend or rev...

text.section: If the licensee has more than one place of business, the Commissioner may suspend or revoke only the licenses of the places of business to which the grounds for suspension or revocation relate. However, if the Commissioner suspends or revokes the license of one place of business and finds that the grounds for that action apply to any other place of business, the Commissioner shall take the same action against the license for each other place of business to which the grounds apply.
